title: Chat Command in Lobby?

embed.description: Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. Never email yourself a file again!

body:
How can you write Like the Cait ... 
it seem like an emote command , can anybody help me?

replies.body: Why this had to be removed {{champion:32}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Today is that day... or maybe it was yesterday. You get the idea.

bring it back Rito this function is valuable!

It helped me express my noble mood

**Síon**: wp :D
_Síon cheers_

Helped me troll people who didn't know about this trick in the champion select.

HigherTier: I'm going to afk.
_HigherTier has left the lobby_

or (My 2nd Account)

iMutedYouAll: Muted.
_iMutedYouAll has muted [Name]_
{{champion:122}} You type /me "message", Yes it actually works in 2k17, 08/12/17, works in lobbies, in messages, but not in champion select or in game.
How you do that ? that don't work for me
